title: Polariod
description: The Polaroid brand is often associated with vibrant and eye-catching colors. Their signature palette includes shades like vibrant blue (#00A3E2), lively green (#1BA548), sunny yellow (#FDC800), warm orange (#F1860E), and striking red (#E41B13), which can often be seen in their branding materials and product designs. These colors are known for evoking a sense of nostalgia and creativity, reminiscent of the iconic instant film photography tradition.
